page.title: 01General Introduction
page.content: The block contains part of {Mintlaw} village and all of {Longside}village and the farmland between them.The two villages are linked East to West by the{River Ugie},one main road A950,one minor road via{Inverquhomery},and a dismantled railway line.The ground rises gently from the flooded plain of the{River Ugie}(25m above sea level) to about 60m both North and South of the river . The two villages provide a contrast. {Mintlaw}was originally a planned village which has in the last ten years been further developed as the point of growth in {Central Buchan while the village of {Longside}is older and has developed naturally. Most of the land is farmed.It is mainly arable with some beef cattle. The main crops are barley,wheat and potatoes and turnips.
